name: mcp-server-21st-dev-magic
description: Create crafted UI components inspired by the best 21st.dev design engineers.

rating.reason: While tool names are reasonably descriptive, the descriptions are poorly structured with inconsistent formatting, contain unnecessary quotes and escape characters, and lack clarity about specific functionality. Parameter descriptions are adequate but inconsistent in quality, with some being vague (e.g., 'Full users message') and others containing grammatical errors. The overall documentation requires significant cleanup to be properly usable.
